title: WTB: 1889 A35 Goodwin Round Album Back Cover
author: RFResnick

posts.post_title: WTB: 1889 A35 Goodwin Round Album Back Cover
posts.post_content:
Howdy, all. In an attempt to help a collector friend, I'm looking for the proverbial needle in a haystack:

The 1889 A35 Goodwin Round Album has 12 pages. I'm looking for just one -- the back cover. 

If you have one for sale -- or know someone who might have one for sale -- would you kindly contact me? 

Many thanks -- Rick
